title: Spring Framework Quiz
description: Spring Boot, Dependency Injection, and enterprise Java development

questions.question: What is Dependency Injection?
questions.explanation: Dependency Injection is a design pattern where the framework automatically provides dependencies to objects, reducing coupling.

questions.question: Which annotation marks a class as a Spring component?
questions.explanation: @Component is the general-purpose annotation for marking a class as a Spring-managed component.

questions.question: Spring Boot requires XML configuration.
questions.explanation: Spring Boot promotes convention over configuration and can work entirely with annotations and auto-configuration.
